data.name: Release 1.0.27
data.body:
* fix: use custom gptURL to verify key (#815) (ecf9c74)
* Merge pull request #799 from GrayXu/z6 (68e3e0a)
* change model selection to input for custom model supports (868acc5)
* Merge pull request #761 from Lslightly/z6 (f0fa5e5)
* Merge branch 'z6' of https://github.com/Lslightly/zotero-pdf-translate into z6 (fc6abfe)
* replace ^ with ~ to avoid using newest version of dependency. limit the zotero-plugin-toolkit version (f5110e5)
* replace ^ with ~ for dependency version. see issue #759 (4c08a50)

data.name: Release Manifest
data.body:
This release is used to host `update.json`, please do not delete or modify it! 
 Updated in UTC 2024-10-05T16:02:28.509Z for version 2.0.3

data.name: Release 1.1.0-beta.39
data.body:
* update: update.json to zotero7-beta70 (98c18cb)
* fix: Zotero 7.0.0-beta.70 (#766) (dab10d3)
* update: min version (551dcbe)
* fix: disable standalone window for now (58c64f6)
* fix: popup for z7 (d262c2e)
* fix: item pane section (854f891)
* fix: prefs pane layout (8729987)
